WorkItem.Description: In Rawr v2.2.0.7, after optimization is complete and the changes are shown, the new score displayed is significantly lower (and does not match) the optimized score the Optimizer found. See the screenshot for details.
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] Optimizer summary screen displays incorrect score

Comments.Message: You'll need to attach the character xml where this happens.
Kavan he's a mage you can just make out his name and server on the image : Saladfork, Anub'arak US. Although on loading from Armory I was unable to reproduce the effect.
You can't just load from armory because everything depends on the settings they are using.

I was able to reproduce this consistently by doing the following procedure.

1) Open my character XML (attached, although I believe it to be unnecessary)
2) Tools -> Optimize
3) Check Override Regem / Reenchant
4) Put the Thoroughness slider all the way to the right
5) *Check optimize talents*
6) Press [Optimize]

Following the above steps but omitting step 5 results in the expected output, leading me to believe that this problem is somehow connected to the new feature of being able to optimize your talents.
I think I found what was causing it, please check in next release.
